name: Aenigma (FinnThePirate)
description:
There is a serial killer on the loose, and he is sending clues to police to play with them.

Aenigma is an ARG game, your job is to find the hidden location. There are number of videos, every video contains clues for unlocking the next video.  You have to find the code of the video and search for it on the in-game video search window in order to unlock a video. 

Last video will give you information about a location.

you can take notes with label maker, you can click and drag app windows

you can watch videos full screen by pressing the screen button on the video player while video is playing.

game is written, shot, acted, developed by me alone
